Hello

Who We Are

OBB is a student-organised website initiated by a group of four students (who also coded up this website!).

Anthony

Coder

Famous for his obsession with hippos, it is commonly thought that Anthony was a hippo in his previous life. Some even say that he is a hippo in disguise of a human!

Emma

Coder

Emma is cool and definitely not a hippo (unlike somebody). Actually, she's a Python (suprise, surprise), so watch out, she bites! If you hate these drawings blame her.

Olivia

Bookworm

Olivia also holds the status of a non-hippo. I guess the hippos are outnumbered now! You can often find Olivia reading (legend says that she evolves into her cat form when reading!).

Emily

Bookworm

Emily is fully human, or is she? **Vsauce music** She can be found near Cinnamoroll, so much so that rumours exist that she is Cinnamoroll!
